SourceProxy.label: Convert To Point Cloud
SourceProxy.name: ConvertToPointCloud

Documentation.long_help: Convert any dataset to a point cloud with or without cells.
Documentation.short_help: Convert any dataset to a point cloud.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The ConvertToPointCloud convert any dataset to a vtkPolyData containing the points and point data of the input and generate either no cells, a single polyvertex cell or many vertex cells. It is more efficient with pointset input.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input dataset to the ConvertToPointCloud filter.

IntVectorProperty.name: CellGenerationMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose if the output should contain either no cells (output may not appear in a render view in that case), a single poly vertex cell and as many vertex cells as there is points.
